
000 LOAD M(020); STOR+ M(002, 0:19)
001 ADD M(026); STOR M(020)
002 LOAD M(000); STOR M(028) 
003 DIV(027);  SUB M(026)
004 JUMP+ M(008, 0:19); LOAD M(022)
005 STOR+ M(007, 0:19); ADD M(026)
006 STOR(022); LOAD M(028)
007 STOR M(000); JUMP M(00B, 0:19)
008 LOAD M(024); STOR+ M(00A, 20:39)
009 ADD M(026); STOR(024)
00A LOAD M(028); STOR M(000)
00B LOAD M(021); SUB M(026)
00C STOR M(021); JUMP +M (000, 0:19)
00D JUMP M(00D, 0:19); NOP

000 0102012002
001 0502621020
002 0100021028
003 0C02706026
004 0F00801022
005 1200705026
006 2102201028

00A 0102821000

00C 210210F000
00D 0D00D00000

020 00 00 01 00 # Apontador V
021 00 00 00 0A # Cont V
022 00 00 01 10 # Apontador Pares
023 00 00 00 0A # Cont Pares
024 00 00 01 20 # Apontador Impares
025 00 00 00 0A # Cont Impares
026 00 00 00 01 # Const 1
027 00 00 00 02 # Const 2
028 00 00 00 00 # n atual

100 00 00 00 01 # Vetor V
101 00 00 00 02
102 00 00 00 03
103 00 00 00 04
